results.title: Association of Amlodipine with the Risk of In-Hospital Death in Patients with COVID-19 and Hypertension: A Reanalysis on 184 COVID-19 Patients with Hypertension
results.text_hl: The third study explored 317 hospitalized @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_COVID_19 @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@COVID-19@@@: 60 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ (55 with @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@) on chronic intake of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ and 257 (129 with @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@) without chronic intake of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ or other FIASMAs.

results.title: Effects of antihypertensive agents on the quality of life in diabetic hypertensive patients: A prospective study
results.text_hl: Henceforth, @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Telmisartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077333 @@@telmisartan@@@ are better choice to control @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@HT@@@ among @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@DM@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.
